text: So, supervised learning algorithms learn to predict input-output or x-to-y mappings. And in the last video, you saw that regression algorithms, which is a type of supervised learning algorithm, learns to predict numbers out of infinitely many possible numbers. There's a second major type of supervised learning algorithm called a classification algorithm. Let's take a look at what this means.
